menu.pf.title: Presence Footsteps Options
pf.mlp.0: Mine Little Pony has been detected!
pf.mlp.1: 4-legged mode is now enabled, which will make running sound like galloping amongst other things.
pf.mlp.2: To disable it hold down CTRL+SHIFT+F for 1 second.
pf.mlp.2.stance: This option will turn off automatically when you remove Mine Little Pony. To disable it now or make it permanent hold down CTRL+SHIFT+F for 1 second.
pf.mlp.2.stance.button: This option will turn off automatically when you remove Mine Little Pony. To disable it now or make it permanent press %s.
pf.update.title: An update is avaiable
